item.title: Books to Read
item.description: Shreemad Bhagwat Gita the courage to be disliked marcus aurelius - medittions big questions of life - om swami who will cry when you die - robin sharma freedom frm the known - j krishna murti seneca on the shortness of life life is long if you know seneca letters rom stoic beyond good and evil the art of living epictetus how to love https://www.dddcommunity.org/wp-content/uploads/files/pdf_articles/Vernon_2011_1.pdf https://www.dddcommunity.org/wp-content/uploads/files/pdf_articles/Vernon_2011_2.pdf https://www.dddcommunity.org/wp-content/uploads/files/pdf_articles/Vernon_2011_3.pdf
